thread.title: Fla. man who works at Disney charged in child pornography case
thread.title_full: Fla. man who works at Disney charged in child pornography case

author: ELIZABETH ELIZALDE
title: Fla. man who works at Disney charged in child pornography case

organizations.name: lake county sheriff’s office    a walt disney

text:
Florida man who works at Disney charged in child pornography case Fla. man who works at Disney charged in child pornography case Richard Morgan, 59, worked as a Disney stage tech and was put on unpaid leave following the child pornography allegations. (Handout/Getty Images) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS  44 PM 
A Florida man who works at Disney admitted to molesting a child and possessing child pornography, officials said Tuesday. 
Officials arrested 59-year-old Disney stage tech Richard Morgan at his Mascotte home Monday after receiving a tip that child pornography was being distributed from the residence, the Lake County Sheriff’s Office   
A Walt Disney spokesperson told the Orlando Sentinel Morgan has been placed on unpaid leave. Morgan, of Mascotte, was arrested Feb. 13 after deputies received a tip that child pornography was being shared from his residence. (Lake County Sheriffs Office) 
Morgan admitted to downloading child pornography for years. He’s charged with possession of child pornography, production of child pornography and lewd or lascivious molestation. 
Detectives collected explicit images showing Morgan molesting a child during their search. He told authorities the child now lives in California where police tracked her down Monday night. 
There, officials arrested her mother, who is believed to have met Morgan online, on molestation charges. 
Authorities are working to identify at least two more victims who they say range in age between 10 and 15 months old. 
Morgan is currently being held at Lake County Detention Center without bond. Tags:
